_header: Of all these keen conquerors to carp is our kind
Subjects: tournaments; Tottenham, (Gloucs.), tournament of; tales, comic
_description: The Turnament of Totenham — in 9-line stanzas (aaaabcccb)

CULFf548.First Lines:
Of alle þese kene conqueroures to carpe is oure kyndeOff fel
                    feghtyng folke ferly we fynde…
CULFf548.Last Lines: …ffor to here preciouseOff six mennys song

HarEng530.First Lines:
Of all the keene conquerers to carpe in ouer kindeof fell fighting
                    folke feerly wee findeThe Turnament of Tottenham haue I in mindeIt
                    were harme such hardines were holden behinde…
HarEng530.Last Lines:
…was Melody deliciousffor to heare Preciousof six mens
                    song
HarEng530.Attributed Title:
Explicit Turnament of Tottenham (f. 1v, added by later
                    hand)
